location.title: Location & Accessibility
location.parking: You can park in the Hilvertshof car park (Groest 100, 1211 ED Hilversum), with an hourly rate of â‚¬2,-. The car park is located about 2 minutes away from BASE.

seo.title: BASE - New streetfood bar Hilversum
